page.shortlink: ux textbox inctrl properties use buttonstyle
page.description: Specify if the button should be styled like a standard 'EditButtonGroup' button. For some styles this will cause the button to have a background color and border. However, for other styles (e.g. iOS style) this will not cause any change of appearance. If you check this property, the button will be displayed 'outside' the other buttons that do not have this property checked; regardless of the order in which the button appears in the list.
